service_info: Good advice is provided for any ailment. Treatment is provided with intensive care.
Renowned soctor for lung siseases. More than 15 years experience.

Repair of organs located in the thorax, or chest. The thoracic cavity lies between the neck and the diaphragm, and contains the heart and lungs (cardiopulmonary system), the esophagus, trachea, pleura, mediastinum, chest wall, and diaphragm.Thoracic surgery repairs diseased or injured organs and tissues in the thoracic cavity.
More than 10 years of experience in Lung surgery. More than 750 lung surgery successfully held.
Special trained on robotic surgeon of thoracic and lung surgery from India. 7 years of experience in robotic surgery.
